entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11.
